entry.title: Shipping python projects by Docker
entry.summary:
Description

Docker is an open source project to easily create lightweight, portable, self-sufficient containers from any application. We can easily build the container in our own laptop and then run this container at scale. There're two parts in my presentation. I'll give a brief introduction first. Then I'll build a image for a simple python website by flask (or Django), and deploy it to my own computer, virtualbox, aws ec2, and google cloud engine.

entry.title: Data Analysis in Python
entry.summary:
Description

Python is one of the best language for data analysis. In this presentation, I'll give an introduction for general data analysis tools written in python, including ipython, numpy, pandas, matplotlib, and sci-kit learn. Some advance topic might be included if time permit: NLTK, SimpleCV, statsmodels, numba etc...

entry.title: R2 DAY3-01 Sentiment Analysis by NLTK - Wei-Ting Kuo (PyCon APAC 2015)
entry.summary:
Description

Speaker: Wei-Ting Kuo

Sentiment analysis is useful, especially for the social media. In this talk, I'd like to introduce some background knowledge and how to use NLTK to do the sentiment analysis. Finally, i'll give a demo for the sentiment analysis for Twitter.

I'll keep the theory part as easy as possible!

About the speaker

Wei-Ting Kuo, Taipei, Taiwan

Oranizor of Docker.Taipei & Meteor.Taipei

Twitter @waitingkuo 組織/公司 Brandkoop 頭銜 CTO

https://tw.pycon.org/2015apac/zh/program/79
